title: ‘Visma Has Been Bluffing’: Tadej Pogačar Tests His Tour de France Rivals and Only Vingegaard Can Answer
content:
'Today we wanted to test the rivals': Sunday's first punch wasn't the knockout blow that some were expecting, but Pogačar is one step closer to the Giro-Tour double.

Read the full article at ‘Visma Has Been Bluffing’: Tadej Pogačar Tests His Tour de France Rivals and Only Vingegaard Can Answer on Velo.
author: ahood
